Pygist
======

Installation
============

Install with pip. ::

    pip install pygist


Pygist Commands
===============

Commands: ::

    pygist login
    
    pygist create <file1> <file2> <fileN> 'description'
    #create a gist with one or more files

    pygist create paste 'description' 
    #create a gist from clipboard data (OS X only)

    pygist delete <gist_id>
    #delete a gist by gist_id
